name: Ted Adventure-The Desert World
description:
Ted Adventure - The Desert World as in classic games with an adventure of super desert boy!

The super desert boy Ted has to pass various tests and beat Dragon to save the princess finally. So many threats are waiting for the super desert boy!

You will have the most amazing and exciting moments when playing this game. All level are carefully design for you. So it's would be very fun.

Your task in this game , is to control castle desert world & avoid traps, kill the boss enemies and others.

The game can bring your childhood memories , when you play .. and other games platform on your retro console.

FEATURES
• Play for all ages
• Game is free
• Spirit of old school classic platformers
• Many items: mushroom, flower, shield, hidden blocks...
• So much scenes (desert, underworld, cave, sky world ....)
• Addictive gameplay
• Wonderful high-resolution graphics
• Easy, intuitive controls
• Rankings for you and your friends
• 52 levels free.

HOW TO PLAY
• Left and right arrows to move left or right
• Arrow down to go inside the pipe to the bonus level where you can find lots of coins
• Button Fire to run faster or firing

Thanks you for playing Ted Adventure - The Desert World. Don't forget to rate and review to help us
